name: ResultFirst
short_description: ResultFirst helps businesses get found on all the major search engines and takes care of their online reputation and PPC campaigns. Our approach is simple: we only get paid when we perform. And when we don’t perform, we don’t take even peanuts. Sounds like a win-win situation, doesn’t it? That’s because it really is. Aside from getting your site rankings and traffic, we emphasize on improvements in its conversion rate and user experience, too. We make sure that your site excels when it comes to its crawlability, usability, performance, content and, well, almost everything.
summary: Resultfirst works on Pay for Performance SEO work model
